pullRequest.title: Add more origin info to quickstart-web.xml elements
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #5361
Added or corrected origin attribute for quickstart-web.xml for:

servlet-mappings
filter-mappings
welcome-files
security-role

Changed the way the origin is generated (which is as a comment!) by the ExtraXmlDescriptorProcessor to depend on the setting of the originAttribute, just like the rest of the generator.

commit.message:
Issue #5360 Add more origin info to quickstart-web.xml elements

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>

Issue #5361 Fix origin generation for ExtraXmlDescriptorProcessor

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>
